title: Context-Based Mathematical Concept Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic arithmetic operations and foundational algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing concept acquisition through modeling real-life problems into mathematical contexts

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze mathematical problems within given situational contexts and design optimal solution strategies.
Learners can correct errors occurring during the mathematical modeling process through contextual feedback.
Learners can apply acquired mathematical concepts to real-world cases through project deliverables.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
